ygData.subject: Re: Words, WHERE?
ygData.msgSnippet: Vampiric Curse is AWESOME... It s a DOT heal that keeps healing you after the creature has died even...
ygData.messageBody:
Vampiric Curse is AWESOME... It's a DOT heal that keeps healing you after
the creature has died even...
